Malice/ Hellplague:

"Yeah," the male said simply.
He lead Blacknightmare out of the lab and down to the dining hall.
"All Minions!  Report to my position!  Unicron has issued new 
orders!" Malice called into his comm to the other minions.  
He let go of Blacknightmare to sit on a table directly infront of 
her, and took her hands in his and said nothing else.

Hellplague continued monitoring th clone, making small corrections as 
she needed to.  She would be able to join the others soon it 
appeared, so she smiled a little as her handywork continued to take 
shape.
